scripts.copy-aos-process: rm -rf aos-process && git clone https://github.com/permaweb/aos.git temp-repo && cd temp-repo && git checkout 15dd81ee596518e2f44521e973b8ad1ce3ee9945 && cd .. && mv temp-repo/process ./aos-process && rm -rf temp-repo && cp ao-build-config.yml aos-process/config.yml
scripts.setup-aos-ant: yarn aos:build && node tools/inject-ant-code.mjs && cp ao-build-config.yml aos-process/config.yml
scripts.module:build: yarn setup-aos-ant && cd aos-process && ao build && cp process.wasm ../dist/aos-ant.wasm && cd ..
scripts.module:publish: ao publish -w tools/key.json dist/aos-ant.wasm -t Compute-Limit -v 9000000000000 -t Memory-Limit -v 1073741824-b -t AOS-Version -v 2.0.1 -t Name -v ARIO-AOS-ANT-0.0.1 -t Module-Format -v wasm32-unknown-emscripten-metering
